name: Pluralsight
description: At Pluralsight, we’re advancing the world’s tech workforce, and that starts with making your teams more proficient, your work more efficient and effective—and giving you more to celebrate. We’re dreaming big, but our work is all about the details. After all, we get to a better tech workforce one skill, one process improvement, one technologist at a time. Find out how we're solving tech workforce challenges, boosting careers, and creating opportunity.
features: Trusted by 70% of the Fortune 500 to train their employees

24-hour remote learning from anywhere, at any time
Get started
Over 7,800 courses in software dev, data & analytics, AI, cyber-security, and cloud
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Pluralsight empowers you to upgrade your skills
ShortDescription: We’re inspiring and empowering the technology workforce to achieve their goals

Highlights.name: Develop internal cloud talent
Highlights.description: Overcome complex challenges, foster cloud expertise, and align skill development strategically.

Highlights.name: Cloud transformation through team creation
Highlights.description: Build outcome-focused skill programs for mission-critical projects and enhance employer reputation.

Highlights.name: Upskilling/reskilling for tech fluency
Highlights.description: Boost collaboration and tech understanding organization-wide with a comprehensive initiative.

enhanced_description: Pluralsight is a comprehensive learning and development platform designed to advance the global tech workforce. Trusted by 70% of Fortune 500 companies, it empowers organizations of all sizes – small, large, and global enterprises – to accelerate skill development and enhance learning efficiency. The platform offers 24-hour remote access to an extensive library of over 7,800 courses, covering critical technology domains such as software development, data & analytics, artificial intelligence, cybersecurity, and cloud computing. Pluralsight addresses key tech workforce challenges by enabling the development of internal cloud talent, facilitating cloud transformation through structured team-based learning, and driving organization-wide upskilling and reskilling initiatives for tech fluency.
key_use_cases: Accelerate skill development and learning efficiency for technology teams
Develop internal cloud talent and foster cloud expertise
Facilitate cloud transformation initiatives through team creation
Implement organization-wide upskilling and reskilling programs for tech fluency
Build outcome-focused skill programs for mission-critical projects
Provide continuous learning and training in software development, data & analytics, AI, cybersecurity, and cloud
competitive_advantages: Trusted by 70% of the Fortune 500, indicating strong enterprise adoption and reliability
Offers 24-hour remote learning from anywhere, at any time, providing significant flexibility and accessibility
Features an extensive catalog of over 7,800 courses in high-demand tech domains (software dev, data & analytics, AI, cyber-security, cloud)
Specializes in advancing the tech workforce and solving specific tech workforce challenges
hr_functions_supported: Talent Management (specifically skill development, upskilling, reskilling)
roi_benefits: Increased team proficiency and improved work efficiency and effectiveness
Accelerated skill development and enhanced learning efficiency
Strategic alignment of skill development with business objectives
Improved project outcomes for mission-critical projects
Fosters cloud expertise within the organization
Boosts collaboration and tech understanding organization-wide
